trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the rocking horse is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the rocking horse move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the rocking horse is animate.

trait.name: Flying Mount
entries: The rocking horse can serve as a mount for a Medium or smaller creature and can fly only while mounted.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The rocking horse doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it regains no hit points or Hit Dice at the end of a long rest.

action.name: Head Butt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.
